name: v0.5.1
body:
## Using BZLMOD

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_distroless", version = "0.5.1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

We do not support WORKSPACE. Use Bzlmod instead.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

name: v0.4.2
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_distroless", version = "0.4.2")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_distroless",
    sha256 = "af93e1f178aea17ada4435881097f43f0392c57f01b6ff7fcd3591868ea53768",
    strip_prefix = "rules_distroless-0.4.2",
    url = "https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/releases/download/v0.4.2/rules_distroless-v0.4.2.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_distroless setup #
######################
# Fetches the rules_distroless dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@rules_distroless//distroless:dependencies.bzl", "distroless_dependencies")

distroless_dependencies()

load("@rules_distroless//distroless:toolchains.bzl", "distroless_register_toolchains")

distroless_register_toolchains()

load("@rules_distroless//apt:apt.bzl", "apt")

# bazel run @bullseye//:lock
apt.install(
    name = "bullseye",
    lock = "@@//:bullseye.lock.json",
    manifest = "//:bullseye.yaml",
)

load("@bullseye//:packages.bzl", "bullseye_packages")

bullseye_packages()

apt.install(
    name = "bullseye_nolock",
    manifest = "//:bullseye.yaml",
    nolock = True,
)

load("@bullseye_nolock//:packages.bzl", "bullseye_nolock_packages")

bullseye_nolock_packages()
```


## What's Changed
* feat: support deduplication in flatten by @thesayyn in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/119
* Handle uncompressed Package files by @JonathanPerry651 in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/129

## New Contributors
* @JonathanPerry651 made their first contribution in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/129

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/compare/v0.4.1...v0.4.2

## What's Changed

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/compare/v0.4.0...v0.4.1

## What's Changed
* feat: add convience targets by @thesayyn in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/115
* fix: apt_deb_repository bzl_library missing dep by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/117

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/compare/v0.3.9...v0.4.0

name: v0.3.9
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_distroless", version = "0.3.9")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_distroless",
    sha256 = "baa2b40100805dc3c2ad5dd1ab8555f1d19484f083a10d685c5812c8b7a78ad8",
    strip_prefix = "rules_distroless-0.3.9",
    url = "https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/releases/download/v0.3.9/rules_distroless-v0.3.9.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_distroless setup #
######################
# Fetches the rules_distroless dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@rules_distroless//distroless:dependencies.bzl", "distroless_dependencies")

distroless_dependencies()

load("@rules_distroless//distroless:toolchains.bzl", "distroless_register_toolchains")

distroless_register_toolchains()

load("@rules_distroless//apt:apt.bzl", "apt")

# bazel run @bullseye//:lock
apt.install(
    name = "bullseye",
    lock = "@@//:bullseye.lock.json",
    manifest = "//:bullseye.yaml",
)

load("@bullseye//:packages.bzl", "bullseye_packages")

bullseye_packages()

apt.install(
    name = "bullseye_nolock",
    manifest = "//:bullseye.yaml",
    nolock = True,
)

load("@bullseye_nolock//:packages.bzl", "bullseye_nolock_packages")

bullseye_nolock_packages()
```


## What's Changed
* dpkg_status should use fixed mtime by @alexeagle in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/105
* document that `cacerts()` requires `SSL_CERT_FILE` set in the environment by @lazcamus in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/102
* fix: e2e MODULE.bazel.lock conflicts and repo name in copy.sh script by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/87
* fix: buildifier by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/108
* tar: Make all gzip compression hermetic by @DolceTriade in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/75
* feat: add MODULE.bazel support to copy.sh plus silent lockless repos by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/88
* refactor: testing by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/91
* refactor: bring deb_index on par with bzlmod api by @thesayyn in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/111
* refactor: improve copy.sh by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/92
* feat: support optional dependencies by @thesayyn in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/59
* docs: improve documentation by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/109
* chore: remove the MODULE.bazel.lock file by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/114

## New Contributors
* @DolceTriade made their first contribution in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/75

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/compare/v0.3.8...v0.3.9

name: v0.3.8
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_distroless", version = "0.3.8")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_distroless",
    sha256 = "6d1d739617e48fc3579781e694d3fabb08fc6c9300510982c01882732c775b8e",
    strip_prefix = "rules_distroless-0.3.8",
    url = "https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/releases/download/v0.3.8/rules_distroless-v0.3.8.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_distroless setup #
######################
# Fetches the rules_distroless dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@rules_distroless//distroless:dependencies.bzl", "distroless_dependencies")

distroless_dependencies()

load("@rules_distroless//distroless:toolchains.bzl", "distroless_register_toolchains")

distroless_register_toolchains()

load("@rules_distroless//apt:index.bzl", "deb_index")

# bazel run @bullseye//:lock
deb_index(
    name = "bullseye",
    lock = "@@//:bullseye.lock.json",
    manifest = "//:bullseye.yaml",
)

load("@bullseye//:packages.bzl", "bullseye_packages")

bullseye_packages()
```


## What's Changed
* fix: target_compatible_with excluding arm64 by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/84
* feat: support multiple components by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/85
* Revert "fix cacert() to work with openssl's defaults #71" by @loosebazooka in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/101
* fix: Debian packages with tar.gz data file by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/99

## New Contributors
* @jjmaestro made their first contribution in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/84

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/compare/v0.3.7...v0.3.8

## What's Changed
* Update README.md by @loopingz in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/78
* fix `cacert()` to work with openssl's defaults by @lazcamus in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/71
* fix: locking with bzlmod by @thesayyn in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/73
* ci: update ci and exclude windows by @thesayyn in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/82
* ci: update release pipeline by @thesayyn in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/83

## New Contributors
* @loopingz made their first contribution in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/78

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/compare/v0.3.6...v0.3.7

## What's Changed
* Return extension_metadata from apt extension by @mortenmj in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/60
* Fail on manifest duplicate packages by @ericlchen1 in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/61
* fix: auto-setting lock attribute on deb_index by @alexeagle in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/63
* fix: apt.deb_index should work without a lock by @thesayyn in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/70

* @ericlchen1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/61

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/compare/v0.3.4...v0.3.5

name: v0.3.3
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark

```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark

    name = "rules_distroless",
    sha256 = "f3f1563a28158ae979c7499714dde84f8273ea890fd138d77a18eb497acd1434",
    strip_prefix = "rules_distroless-0.3.3",

distroless_dependencies()
```


## What's Changed
* fix: improve parsing of Package.gz metadata, matching Debian parser logic by @alexconrey in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/43
* Fix for packages sharing the same dependencies by @jacobshirley in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/32
* fix: trim trailing '/' on URL if provided in package YAML by @alexconrey in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/45
* feat: support apt colon arch syntax by @NotBobTheBuilder in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/38
* support zstd compressed {control,data}.tar files by @lazcamus in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/41
* fix package `:data` visibility so it's compatible with `cacerts()` by @lazcamus in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/44
* chore: add an example for snapshot.ubuntu.com by @thesayyn in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/47
* docs: fix typos and restructure sentences by @thesayyn in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/48
* Support Packages.gz indices by @mortenmj in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/40

## New Contributors
* @alexconrey made their first contribution in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/43
* @NotBobTheBuilder made their first contribution in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/38
* @lazcamus made their first contribution in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/41
* @mortenmj made their first contribution in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/40

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/compare/v0.3.2...v0.3.3

name: v0.3.2
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_distroless", version = "0.3.2")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_distroless",
    sha256 = "4e5973bb00d15e5344b71b8d759a2369401d193d2e1f5d4a56f66347fcfd5c89",
    strip_prefix = "rules_distroless-0.3.2",
    url = "https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/releases/download/v0.3.2/rules_distroless-v0.3.2.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_distroless setup #
######################
# Fetches the rules_distroless dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
load("@rules_distroless//distroless:dependencies.bzl", "distroless_dependencies")

distroless_dependencies()
```


## What's Changed
* Fix lockfiles in root of workspace by @jacobshirley in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/33
* fix: always install highest version by @thesayyn in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/35

## New Contributors
* @jacobshirley made their first contribution in https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/pull/33

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/rules_distroless/compare/v0.3.1...v0.3.2
